pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kernel SHAP // Efficient implementation of Kernel SHAP, see Lundberg and Lee (2017), and Covert and Lee (2021) http://proceedings.mlr.press/v130/covert21a. Furthermore, for up to 14 features, exact permutation SHAP values can be calculated. The package plays well together with meta-learning packages like 'tidymodels', 'caret' or 'mlr3'. Visualizations can be done using the R package 'shapviz'.
